DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Diagnosis prediabetes base hemoglobin A1C and/or fast plasma glucose Established patient Principal Investigator 's clinical practice BMI great equal 25 kg/m2 Physically able participate diabetes prevention program Has prior diagnosis diabetes Is pregnant plan become pregnant next 6 month Is currently take medication prescribe diabetes prevention Is currently enrol formal diabetes prevention weight loss program
